title: simple sans-serif bold all caps, maybe extra bold?
content:
A clean, simple font used by Fake Empire Productions. Any idea what it is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fakeempire.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713224409/http:/typophile.com/files/fakeempire.png) | 10.61 KB |
author: joshisms

comments.content:
I know this isn't the most exciting logo font out there, but if anyone could point me in the right direction I would appreciate it.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713224409im_/http:/static.tumblr.com/arlul7p/CtWl84wvm/fe_logo.png)

Many thanks!
Frankly, it looks like Futura Extrabold with a fake /M...

Thank you! Do you or anyone else have an alternative you are partial to using instead of Futura Extra Bold? Thanks for the quick replies!  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713224409im_/http:/www.todayandtomorrow.net/wp-content/uploads/2009/04/futura_2.jpg)
